div.em: Current conditions as of 22 Apr 08:58 am EDT

div.div: A 10 percent chance of rain after 5pm. Increasing clouds, with a high near 40. Southwest wind around 5 mph.
A slight chance of rain and snow before 11pm, then a slight chance of snow between 11pm and 5am. Cloudy, with a low around 30. East wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

A slight chance of snow before 10am, then a slight chance of rain and snow between 10am and noon, then a slight chance of rain after noon. Cloudy, with a high near 43. East wind 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.
